metadata.title: CVE-2023-35970 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 chain_table parsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115.A specially crafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. Avictim would need to open a malicious file to trigger thesevulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns the chain_table of the`FST_BL_VCDATA_DYN_ALIAS2` section type.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
